hackathon-description-text: Lifecycle Management (LM) is a game changer and you have a chance to learn about it! LM allows business users to build end-to-end responsive web and mobile applications without requiring any technical knowledge. It can impact every Cignium employee. It can redefine our roles and responsibilities and provide opportunities to help unleash the intrapreneur in all of us.
hackathon-eligibility:
1. Participants  are required to be a Cignium Employee in order to participate in the Hackathon.
2. Participants are required to be physically present in the in one of the Cignium Locations. Remote participation will be accepted on a case-by-case basis.
hackathon-requirements:
1. Participants are required to build a fully functional application on the LM platform.
2. Participants are required to submit a description of the idea, Challenges faced and Suggestions/improvements for the Lifecycle Management platform.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2200 Fletcher Ave, Fort Lee, NJ 07024, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Its all about the Idea! Come up with an Idea – It can be as Crazy and Wild as you want it to be! 

Original and creative ideas will obviously score more
Appropriate use of LM features (Forms, Table Rules, Models, Processes, Queries) to solve the eproblem

hackathon-location-address: 2200 Fletcher Ave, Fort Lee, NJ 07024, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come up with an Idea and Create an App within 24 hours on the Lifecycle Management Platform
